block_comment: This block of code manages error detection and status storing in a hardware design. If a reset signal or manual error-clear command is issued, it will clear existing error status and flags. However, if neither of these is activated, and a data error is flagged — and no other error has been previously flagged — status is updated with specific information about data location and access statuses, and an error flag is set. In the final part of the block, it is ensuring zero-padding or unset of extra error_status bits to keep status records concise and accurate.
